trader_natr

(PECL trader >= 0.2.0)

trader_natr — Normalized Average True Range

说明

trader_natr ( array $high , array $low , array $close [, int $timePeriod ] ) : array

参数

high

高价，浮点数数组。

low

低价，浮点数数组。

close

收盘价，浮点数数组。

timePeriod

Number of period. Valid range from 2 to 100000.

返回值

Returns an array with calculated data or false on failure.
